body.raw:
# NumberInput The NumberInput component is like the Input component but includes controls to adjust a numeric value. ## Installation ## Import - **NumberInputRoot**: All parts of the number input are included. - **NumberInputField**: The input field itself. - **NumberInputButtonGroup**: A wrapper for the input's increment and decrement buttons. - **NumberInputPlus**: This button increases the input value. - **NumberInputMinus**: This button decreases the input value. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { NumberInput } from '@melio-ui/number-input'; ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### NumberInputRoot All parts of the number input are included. NumberInputValue

number | null ), description: 'The number input value.', }, { name: 'defaultValue', required: false, type: ( <> NumberInputValue

number | null ), description: "The initial value of the number input when first rendered, for use when state control isn't needed.", }, { name: 'disabled', required: false, type: 'boolean', description: 'Determines if the input field and buttons are disabled.', }, { name: 'min', required: false, default: '-Infinity', type: 'number', description: 'Minimum value of number input.', }, { name: 'max', required: false, default: 'Infinity', type: 'number', description: 'Maximum value for numeric input.', }, { name: 'step', required: false, default: '1', type: 'number', description: 'Steps used to increase or decrease values.', }, { name: 'onValueChange', required: false, type: '(value: NumberInputValue) => void', description: 'An event handler that is called when the value changes.', }, ]} /> ### NumberInputField The input field itself. ### NumberInputButtonGroup A wrapper for the input's increment and decrement buttons. ### NumberInputPlus This button increases the input value. ### NumberInputMinus This button decreases the input value. ## Examples ### Set the minimum and maximum values ```jsx ``` ### Set step size ```jsx ``` ### Custom Style ```jsx ```
